description: A Full-Stack web application, where users can reserve home services like Electrician, Plumber, Gardening etc. User can also delete the reservation. The Admin can add new services and delete existing services.

CrCrypto is a cutting-edge cryptocurrency exchange web application that empowers you to explore the exciting world of digital assets with ease and security. With our user-friendly platform, you can buy, sell, and trade a wide range of cryptocurrencies effortlessly. Experience lightning-fast transactions, robust security measures, and real-time market data to make informed investment decisions.

PaidIn is your ultimate finance managing web application, designed to simplify and elevate your financial life. Take control of your money with ease through our intuitive interface. Track expenses, set budgets, and achieve your financial goals effortlessly.

E-learning: Unlock Engineering Excellence Online Discover the gateway to engineering mastery with our cutting-edge web application, E-learning. Dive into a world of knowledge as we offer a diverse range of courses designed to hone your engineering skills. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned professional, our platform provides expert-led courses that cater to all levels.
